title: AI, robotics talent empowerment to be highlighted in Parliament today
description: KUALA LUMPUR: Empowering talent in emerging technologies such as artificial intelligence (AI) and robotics is among the key issues to be raised in the Dewan Rakyat on Thursday (Nov 5).
content:

title: Apple to use Google's AI model to run new Siri, Bloomberg News reports
description: (Reuters) -Apple plans to use a 1.2 trillion-parameter artificial intelligence model developed by Alphabet's Google to help power a revamp of its Siri voice assistant, Bloomberg News reported on Wednesday.
content:
(Reuters) -Apple plans to use a 1.2 trillion-parameter artificial intelligence model developed by Alphabet's Google to help power a revamp of its Siri voice assistant, Bloomberg News reported on Wednesday.

title: Collins' Word of the Year for 2025 revealed
description: Vibe coding, an emerging software development that turns natural language into computer code using artificial intelligence (AI), has been named Collins' Word of the Year for 2025.
content:

title: Snap beats revenue estimates on ad boost, unveils deal with Perplexity AI
description: (Reuters) -Snap beat third-quarter revenue estimates on Wednesday and said it has partnered with Perplexity AI to integrate its artificial intelligence-powered search engine into Snapchat.
content:
(Reuters) -Snap beat third-quarter revenue estimates on Wednesday and said it has partnered with Perplexity AI to integrate its artificial intelligence-powered search engine into Snapchat.

title: Arm Holdings 3rd-quarter forecast tops expectations, shares rise
description: SAN FRANCISCO (Reuters) -Chip technology provider Arm Holdings gave a fiscal third-quarter forecast on Wednesday that topped Wall Street's expectations, boosted by the boom in artificial intelligence computing.
content:
SAN FRANCISCO (Reuters) -Chip technology provider Arm Holdings gave a fiscal third-quarter forecast on Wednesday that topped Wall Street's expectations, boosted by the boom in artificial intelligence computing.

title: US House lawmakers probe Delta Air Lines on use of AI in ticket pricing
description: WASHINGTON (Reuters) -A group of two dozen U.S. House Democratic lawmakers asked Delta Air Lines CEO Ed Bastian on Wednesday to answer questions about whether it will use generative artificial intelligence to help set ticket prices.
content:
WASHINGTON (Reuters) -A group of two dozen U.S. House Democratic lawmakers asked Delta Air Lines CEO Ed Bastian on Wednesday to answer questions about whether it will use generative artificial intelligence to help set ticket prices.

title: 'Tutors' at Musk startup xAI had to give up rights to faces, voices to train sexy AI bots: report
description: Employees at Elon Musk’s artificial intelligence startup xAI reportedly had to sign away the rights to their own faces and voices to help train the company's next generation of chatbots -- including a sexually suggestive virtual companion named "Ani."

title: Global Bond Binge Lifts Sales to Record $5.94 Trillion This Year
description: Global bond sales have soared to a record this year as borrowers take advantage of easy market conditions to fund everything from the boom in artificial intelligence projects to a revival in acquisitions.
